erase_if

Synopsis

Defined in header <boost/static_string/static_string.hpp> 

template<
    std::size_t N,
    typename CharT,
    typename Traits,
    typename UnaryPredicate>
constexpr basic_static_string< N, CharT, Traits >::size_type
erase_if(
    basic_static_string< N, CharT, Traits >& str,
    UnaryPredicate pred);
